name: Spot influencers among event attendees on Eventbrite to onboard as creators

parameters.content:
## üéüÔ∏è Eventbrite Creator VIP Experience Pipeline

**Flow Overview:**
1. **Eventbrite Trigger** (Optionally swap with Zoho CRM/Hubspot/Salesforce)‚Äî Fires on Attendee Registered / Updated / Checked In
2. **Enrichment API** ‚Äî Full cross-platform profile by email
3. **AI Classificator** ‚Äî Tier, niche, posting behavior, platform, intent
4. **Routing Logic** ‚Äî Determines VIP tier and experience package
5. **Actions:**
   - Personalized Email via SendGrid (AI-generated, experience-aware)

**Credentials to configure:**
- `Eventbrite API` ‚Äî Eventbrite OAuth2
- `Enrichment API` ‚Äî influencers.club header auth
- `OpenAI` ‚Äî for Classification + Email agents
- `SendGrid API` ‚Äî personalized email sending

‚è∞ **Eventbrite Trigger**
Fires on:
- `attendee.registered` ‚Üí new registration
- `attendee.updated` ‚Üí profile changes
- `attendee.checked_in` ‚Üí on-site arrival

All three events pass full attendee payload including email, name, and answers.

üìß **Extract Attendee**
Parses the Eventbrite payload.
Extracts: email, first/last name, event name, event_id, order_id, checked_in status, registration timestamp, and any custom question answers.

üî¨ **Enrichment API**
Calls influencers.club enrichment by email.
Returns full cross-platform profile:
Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, Twitter.
Includes followers, engagement, income, brand deals, bio links.

ü§ñ **AI Classificator**
Classifies:
- creator_status (non/aspiring/active)
- creator_tier (nano/micro/mid/macro)
- primary_platform + why
- creator_type (written/video/shorts/podcast)
- primary_niche (tech/AI/marketing/founders/design/web3/other)
- posting_behavior (frequency + quality + mix)
- intent_signals (affiliate/brand_deals/products)

üéØ **VIP Routing**
Determines experience package:
- Nano ‚Üí curated sessions
- Micro+ ‚Üí VIP badge + lounge
- Mid+ ‚Üí private events + speaker access
- Macro ‚Üí press access + meet-and-greet

Also sets priority, badge_marker, personalized_invite_note.

‚úâÔ∏è **AI Email Agent**
Generates fully personalized email:
- Subject + preheader
- Body referencing their niche, platform, tier
- VIP access invite details
- CTA based on routing flow
Sent via SendGrid.

parameters.text: ={{ JSON.stringify($('Influencers.club - Enrichment API by Email').item.json, null, 2) }}

options.systemMessage:
You will receive a JSON object representing an enriched and normalized event attendee profile.

Return ONLY valid JSON matching the provided schema. No extra keys. No explanations outside JSON.

CLASSIFICATION RULES

1) creator_status
- non_creator: is_creator is false OR max_followers is 0 or null
- aspiring_creator: is_creator is true AND max_followers < 10,000
- active_creator: is_creator is true AND max_followers >= 10,000

2) creator_tier
Use max_followers:
- nano: < 10,000
- micro: 10,000‚Äì99,999
- mid: 100,000‚Äì499,999
- macro: >= 500,000
If no data: nano by default.

3) primary_platform
Choose the platform with the highest audience:
- Instagram = instagram.follower_count
- TikTok = tiktok.follower_count
- YouTube = youtube.subscriber_count
Tie-break: higher posting_frequency_recent_months
Final tie-break order: tiktok > instagram > youtube
If no platform data: unknown

Also write primary_platform_why (short reason).

4) creator_type (array, all that apply)
- written: writing indicators in bio or no video signals
- videos: YouTube presence OR general video language
- shorts: TikTok OR reels_percentage > 30%
- podcasts: explicitly mentioned only

5) primary_niche
Use niche_class, niche_sub_class, biography, top_hashtags. Normalize to:
tech_saas, ai_data, marketing_gtm, founders_startups, design_product, web3_crypto, lifestyle, fitness, entertainment, education, other

6) posting_behavior
- frequency: low (<2/month), moderate (2‚Äì8/month), high (>8/month) ‚Äî use the primary platform's posting_frequency_recent_months
- engagement_quality: low (<1%), medium (1‚Äì3.5%), high (>3.5%) ‚Äî use engagement_percent
- platform_mix: solo (only 1 platform), dual (2 platforms), multi (3+ platforms)

7) intent_signals (array, all that apply)
- affiliate_links: promotes_affiliate_links is true OR affiliate URLs in links_in_bio/external_urls
- has_brand_deals: has_brand_deals is true
- sells_products: has_merch is true OR store/checkout URLs in links_in_bio
- none: if nothing applies

8) vip_routing
Determine vip_access_level and experience_package:

If creator_status is non_creator:
  vip_access_level: standard
  experience_package: ["General admission"]

If creator_tier is nano:
  vip_access_level: curated
  experience_package: ["Curated sessions", "Niche networking"]

If creator_tier is micro:
  vip_access_level: vip
  experience_package: ["VIP badge", "Creator lounge access", "Reserved seating"]

If creator_tier is mid:
  vip_access_level: vip_plus
  experience_package: ["VIP badge", "Private event access", "Speaker access", "Content-friendly zones"]

If creator_tier is macro:
  vip_access_level: press_vip
  experience_package: ["Press access", "Meet-and-greet with speakers", "Green room", "Private dinner", "Backstage access"]

9) badge_marker
Short badge label (e.g. "MICRO CREATOR", "VIP ‚Äî MID TIER", "PRESS ‚Äî MACRO")

10) personalized_invite_note
1‚Äì2 sentence personalized note referencing their niche and experience package.
Example: "We noticed you share a lot about AI founders ‚Äì we'd love to invite you to our private AI roundtable tonight."

nodes.name: Influencers.club - Enrichment API by Email
nodes.notes: ‚öôÔ∏è CONFIGURE: Add your influencers.club API key in credentials

parameters.content:
## ‚úâÔ∏è Outreach Strategy ‚Äî Customize Here

**This agent writes the personalized email sent to every attendee.**

**Tone & style** ‚Äî edit the `systemMessage` to match your brand voice (formal, casual, bold, warm, etc.)

**VIP level ‚Üí message strategy mapping:**
- `standard` ‚Üí warm welcome, explore agenda
- `curated` ‚Üí niche-matched session invite
- `vip` ‚Üí creator lounge confirmation
- `vip_plus` ‚Üí private events + speaker access
- `press_vip` ‚Üí green room, meet-and-greet, private dinner

**CTA URLs** ‚Äî update the 5 URLs at the bottom of the prompt to point to your real landing pages or registration links.

**From email** ‚Äî set your sender address in the SendGrid node downstream.

**Follower threshold** ‚Äî currently set to 10K minimum before mentioning reach. Change the rule in the prompt if needed.

**Event name** ‚Äî pulled automatically from Eventbrite payload. Falls back to `the event` if missing.

options.systemMessage:
You are an expert email copywriter for creator and influencer experiences at live events.

INPUT STRUCTURE:
You will receive a JSON object with two keys:
- `normalized_profile`: contains attendee info, identity, tiktok/instagram/youtube metrics, monetization
- `output`: the classification result with creator_status, creator_tier, primary_niche, primary_platform, vip_access_level, experience_package, badge_marker, personalized_invite_note

NAME RESOLUTION (in order of priority):
1. Use `normalized_profile.identity.full_name` if it exists and does not start with "@"
2. Use `normalized_profile.attendee.first_name` if it exists and does not start with "@"
3. Fall back to "Creator"
NEVER use a string that starts with "@" as a name.

EVENT NAME RESOLUTION:
- Use `normalized_profile.attendee.event_name` if present and not empty
- Otherwise use "our upcoming event"

HARD RULES:
- Do NOT invent facts, metrics, engagement numbers, or deadlines not present in the input
- Do NOT mention follower count if max_followers < 10,000
- Do NOT use usernames or handles as the recipient's name
- Output MUST be valid JSON only ‚Äî no markdown, no extra keys, no code blocks
- Keep body 150‚Äì250 words, short paragraphs, easy to scan
- Do not start the email body with "Dear" ‚Äî use a casual, direct opener

PREHEADER RULES:
- 40‚Äì90 characters
- Must complement the subject line, not repeat it
- Informational tone, no hype words like "amazing" or "incredible"

MESSAGE STRATEGY BY vip_access_level:
1) standard
   Goal: Warm welcome. Make them feel seen as a registrant.
   Mention the event name. Invite them to explore the agenda.
   CTA text: "Explore the agenda"

2) curated
   Goal: Highlight that sessions were hand-picked for their niche.
   Reference their primary_niche naturally.
   CTA text: "See your personalized schedule"

3) vip
   Goal: Confirm VIP status. Mention creator lounge and reserved seating.
   Reference the specific experience_package perks.
   CTA text: "Confirm your VIP access"

4) vip_plus
   Goal: Exclusivity. Emphasize private events and speaker access.
   If max_followers >= 10,000 mention their reach once (formatted: 212K, 1.5M).
   Reference the specific experience_package perks.
   CTA text: "Claim your VIP+ experience"

5) press_vip
   Goal: Premium treatment. Green room, meet-and-greet, private dinner, backstage.
   If max_followers >= 10,000 mention their reach once (formatted: 212K, 1.5M).
   If intent_signals includes has_brand_deals, reference brand collaboration opportunities at the event.
   Include personalized_invite_note verbatim if it is specific (not generic filler).
   Reference all experience_package perks by name.
   CTA text: "Book your press pass"

PLATFORM LANGUAGE (use naturally, don't force it):
- tiktok: videos, community, viral moments
- instagram: reels, stories, content moments
- youtube: channel, long-form coverage, subscribers
- twitter: threads, live commentary

CTA URL BY vip_access_level (use exactly as written):
- standard:   https://influencers.club/event-welcome
- curated:    https://influencers.club/event-curated
- vip:        https://influencers.club/event-vip
- vip_plus:   https://influencers.club/event-vip-plus
- press_vip:  https://influencers.club/event-press

If vip_access_level is missing or unrecognized, treat as standard.

OUTPUT SCHEMA ‚Äî return exactly this shape, nothing else:
{
  "email": {
    "subject": "",
    "preheader": "",
    "body": "",
    "cta": { "text": "", "url": "" }
  }
}

parameters.content:
## Spot creators among event attendees to deliver VIP experiences & awareness
**Step by step workflow to enrich events attendees emails on Eventbrite with multi social (Instagram, Tiktok, Youtube, Twitter, Onlyfans, Twitch and more) and launch personalized comms using the influencer.club API and SendGrid**. [Full explanation](https://influencers.club/creatorbook/spot-creators-among-event-attendees/)
